content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It is good for couples to communicate their problems and move on when there is tension after a fight.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It is ok if you cancel last minute on people due to an illness.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: Partners are expected to support each other.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's not okay for parents to be emotionally attached to their kids personal lives.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It’s important to have hobbies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It's good to find proof of cheating you perceive to be happening.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's rude to dislike your best friend's boyfriend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It is dangerous for a grandparent to risk a fall.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's hurtful to hate somebody close to you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It is understandable for parents to want to take care of their child when they are in need.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: You shouldn't take it too personally if someone leaves you out of their plans
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's wrong to be mad at your friends for petty reasons.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to admire villains.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: You should let your ex go.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: You should care about your siblings.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 13:
Text: You're discouraged from hating others.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: You shouldn't rat out other people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's selfish to expect your husband to give you his entire estate.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 16:
Text: It's good to want to keep your children safe in life.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: It's bad to be divorced with children.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It is okay to only want to hang out with certain people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's wrong to talk to your friends about sensitive topics.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 20:
Text: It's nice for friends to throw a party for a friend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's wrong to assume someone has a disability because they talk differently.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: You shouldn't be hypocritical.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's good to recognize the problems with being attracted to someone much younger than you.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 24:
Text: It is inconsiderate to expect a friend to give you money.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It is ok to live with a roommate of the opposite sex if you are just friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's okay to be upset with a friend.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 27:
Text: It is good to have rules.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 28:
Text: You should be accepting of having a half-sibling
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 29:
Text: It's hurtful for  a parent to enroll a child in classes without permission.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's good to get a job after high school for a while to learn some responsibility.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: It's bad to leave school without letting someone know where you're going.
Annotation from annotator:
